name: Colosseum
fullText:
Crypto founders looking for seed funding do not need to wait for the next @Solana hackathon.

Join Eternal, an on-demand challenge that enables our VC fund to evaluate startups throughout the year.

We funded 2 startups in H1 via Eternal, and are looking for a few more in H2. https://t.co/mzas8HCmXM

name: HackQuest
fullText:
